page.title: 15NEW ARK ADVENTURE PLAYGROUND
page.content: The{New Ark Play Association}has been going for 12 years but it has moved three times.Where it is now it has been there for 5 years. It has an adventure playground which children from 5_16 years old can use.It is mostly made from wood and tyres. It has a swing and lots of climbing frames. They also have lots of pieces of wood so you can build yourself a den. They also have chickens and ducks so the children can feed them and look after them. You can do art and craft too, like making masks and pots. Lots of people like to do some printing too. There is also a kitchen so you can do some cooking and make cakes. The play group is owned by the New Ark Play Association. They have an Urban Aid grant to help pay for things that they need.
